00032 /*! \file ExceptionBase.h This file provides base class definition for the exception class.
00033 */ 
00034 namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions
00035 {
00036         /*! Base exception class for the Calvin File SDK */
00037         class CalvinException
00038         {
00039                 protected:
00040                         /*! Source in the _MSC_VER use case is used for registry lookup to determine the resource file. 
00041                                 The message code is used incojuction with source to lookup the specific message string based on code.
00042                         */
00043                         std::wstring sourceName;
00044                         /*! Message for the exception */
00045                         std::wstring errorDescription;
00046                         /*! Date/Time stamp of exception */
00047                         std::wstring timeStamp;
00048                         /*! File the exception occured in */
00049                         std::string fileName;
00050                         /*! Line number that the exception occured */
00051                         u_int16_t lineNumber;
00052                         /*! Message code to be used by client for logic or to use for lookup in localized resource file */
00053                         u_int64_t errorCode;
00054 
00055                 public:
00056 
00057                 /*! Constructor
00058                 * Default constructor. Initializes all variables to 0 if numeric, "" if string and the date to the current date and time.
00059                 */
00060                 CalvinException();
00061 
00062                 /*! Constructor
00063                 * Constructs a CalvinException object.
00064                 *
00065                 * @param _Source Typically will be the application name. Can also be the file sdk object type E.g. "Array File Reader".
00066                 * @param _Description A brief message which describes what happened.
00067                 * @param _TimeStamp Time and date the exception occured.
00068                 * @param _FileName File name of the source file the exception occured. The __FILE__ can be used to determine this information.
00069                 * @param _LineNumber Line number in the source file that generated the exception. The __LINE__ can be used to determine this information.
00070                 * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00071                 */
00072                 CalvinException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, std::wstring _TimeStamp, std::string _FileName, u_int16_t _LineNumber, u_int64_t _ErrorCode);
00073 
00074                 /*! Constructor
00075                 * Constructs a CalvinException object
00076                 * Note: The time date stamp will be automatically set to the current time.
00077                 *
00078                 * @param _Source Typically will be the application name. Can also be the file sdk object type E.g. "Array File Reader".
00079                 * @param _Description A brief message which describes what happened.
00080                 * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00081                 */
00082                 CalvinException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, u_int64_t _ErrorCode);
00083 
00084                 /*! Constructor
00085                 * Constructs a CalvinException object
00086                 * Note: The time date stamp will be automatically set to the current time.
00087                 *
00088                 * @param _Description A brief message which describes what happened.
00089                 * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00090                 */
00091                 CalvinException(std::wstring _Description, u_int64_t _ErrorCode);
00092                 /*! Constructor
00093                 * Constructs a CalvinException object
00094                 * Note: The time date stamp will be automatically set to the current time.
00095                 *
00096                 * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00097                 */
00098                 CalvinException(u_int64_t _ErrorCode);
00099 
00100                 /*! The source name associated with the exception.
00101                 *
00102                 * @return The source name associated with the exception.
00103                 */
00104                 std::wstring Source();
00105                 /*! The source name associated with the exception.
00106                 *
00107                 * @param value Source name associated with the exception.
00108                 */
00109                 void Source(std::wstring value);
00110                 /*! The error description associated with the exception.
00111                 *
00112                 * @return The error description associated with the exception.
00113                 */
00114                 std::wstring Description();
00115                 /*! The error description associated with the exception.
00116                 *
00117                 * @param value Error description associated with the exception.
00118                 */
00119                 void Description(std::wstring value);
00120                 /*! The error time stamp associated with the exception.
00121                 *
00122                 * @return The error time stamp associated with the exception.
00123                 */
00124                 std::wstring TimeStamp();
00125                 /*! The error time stamp associated with the exception.
00126                 *
00127                 * @param value Error time stamp associated with the exception.
00128                 */
00129                 void TimeStamp(std::wstring value);
00130                 /*! The error source file name associated with the exception.
00131                 *
00132                 * @return The source file name associated with the exception.
00133                 */
00134                 std::string SourceFile();
00135                 /*! The error source file name associated with the exception.
00136                 *
00137                 * @param value Source file name associated with the exception.
00138                 */
00139                 void SourceFile(std::string value);
00140                 /*! The error source line number associated with the exception.
00141                 *
00142                 * @return The source line number associated with the exception.
00143                 */
00144                 u_int16_t LineNumber();
00145                 /*! The error source line number associated with the exception.
00146                 *
00147                 * @param value Source line number associated with the exception.
00148                 */
00149                 void LineNumber(u_int16_t value);
00150 
00151                 /*! The error code associated with the exception.
00152                 *
00153                 * @return The error code associated with the exception.
00154                 */
00155                 u_int64_t ErrorCode();
00156                 /*! The error code associated with the exception.
00157                 *
00158                 * @param value Error code associated with the exception.
00159                 */
00160                 void ErrorCode(u_int64_t value);
00161 
00162                 /*! Returns a string describing the exception
00163                 *
00164                 * @return Returns a string describing the exception.
00165                 */
00166                 const std::wstring ToString();
00167 
00168                 /*! Format source file, line and time stamp.
00169                  *
00170                  * @return Returns a string combining source file, line number and time stamp.
00171                  */
00172                 std::wstring SystemInfo();
00173                 
00174         };
00175 
00176 }
